question: Who invented the World Wide Web?

ctxs.title: Internet_History
ctxs.text: The history of the internet dates back to the 1960s.

ctxs.title: Tim_Berners_Lee
ctxs.text: Tim Berners-Lee is credited with inventing the World Wide Web, a major component of the internet.

ctxs.title: Vint_Cerf
ctxs.text: Vint Cerf is known as one of the 'fathers of the internet' for his work on TCP/IP protocols.

ctxs.title: ARPANET
ctxs.text: The ARPANET project, funded by the US Department of Defense, was a precursor to the modern internet.

ctxs.title: Inventors
ctxs.text: Many individuals contributed to the development of the internet, including Tim Berners-Lee and Vint Cerf.

question: Who is Minqi X from Hubei?

ctxs.title: Hubei
ctxs.text: Hubei is a province in China.

ctxs.title: Minqi
ctxs.text: Minqi X comes from Hubei and is a MSc student at Imperial College London.

ctxs.title: minqi
ctxs.text: Minqi X is a professional dancer in China.

ctxs.title: minchi
ctxs.text: Minchi Z is a cook in France!

ctxs.title: min5
ctxs.text: Min Xiang works as an engineer in Germany.
